test_cases.query: Alphabet Inc. marketable and non-marketable equity securities carrying value December 31 2023 and December 31 2024
test_cases.golden_answer: As of December 31, 2023, the carrying value for marketable equity securities was $5,973 million and for non-marketable equity securities was $28,766 million. As of December 31, 2024, these values were $5,079 million and $35,531 million, respectively.

test_cases.query: Apple Inc. stock upgraded to hold solid Q4 results robust sales growth
test_cases.target_chunk_text: In late August, I provided an update on Apple Inc. (AAPL) and upgraded the stock to a hold, as there were signs that their business had hit an inflection point. As shown below, that update was quite t...
test_cases.golden_answer: Apple Inc. stock was upgraded to a hold in late August. This upgrade was followed by Apple delivering solid Q4 results with robust sales growth.

test_cases.query: Microsoft Corporation IRS NOPAs $28.9 billion intercompany transfer pricing
test_cases.target_chunk_text:
PART I

Item 2

Uncertain Tax Positions

We remain under audit by the IRS for tax years 2014 to 2017. With respect to the audit for tax years 2004 to 2013, on September 26, 2023, we received Notices o...
test_cases.golden_answer: On September 26, 2023, Microsoft Corporation received Notices of Proposed Adjustment (NOPAs) from the IRS, primarily related to intercompany transfer pricing. The IRS is seeking an additional tax payment of $28.9 billion plus penalties and interest, which Microsoft disagrees with and plans to contest.

test_cases.query: Apple Inc. forward-looking statements fiscal years ended in September www.apple.com investor.apple.com
test_cases.target_chunk_text:
Item 2. Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations

This Item and other sections of this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q (“Form 10-Q”) contain forward-looking ...
test_cases.golden_answer: Apple Inc.'s forward-looking statements are defined as current expectations of future events, not guarantees of performance, and are identified by specific terms. The Company's fiscal years end in September, and investor information is available on www.apple.com and investor.apple.com.

test_cases.query: Microsoft Corporation Sales and marketing expenses include payroll employee benefits stock-based compensation expense Three Months Ended March 31, 2025 Sales and marketing expenses were relatively unchanged
test_cases.target_chunk_text: Sales and marketing expenses include payroll, employee benefits, stock-based compensation expense, and other headcount-related expenses associated with sales and marketing personnel, and the costs of ...
test_cases.golden_answer: Microsoft Corporation's Sales and marketing expenses include payroll, employee benefits, stock-based compensation expense, and other headcount-related expenses, as well as advertising, promotions, trade shows, seminars, and other programs. For the Three Months Ended March 31, 2025, these expenses were relatively unchanged.
